scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn codegen && graph deploy cowprotocol/cow --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.//deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn codegen && graph deploy gabrielcamba/cow-prices-mainnet --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && yarn codegen && graph deploy cowprotocol/cow-rinkeby --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.//deploy:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && yarn codegen && graph deploy gabrielcamba/cow-prices-rinkeby --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy:gc: yarn prepare:gc && yarn codegen && graph deploy cowprotocol/cow-gc --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.//deploy:gc: yarn prepare:gc && yarn codegen && graph deploy gabrielcamba/cow-prices-gc --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy:dev: yarn prepare:<Network> && yarn codegen && graph deploy <YourGithubUser/YourSubgraph> --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
